name: 蔡舜宏
objective: 中文課程概述： 本課程主要分成兩部份，第一部份將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
schedule:
week 1　　Introduction
week 2　　Operations of vector and matrix
week 3　　Initial value problem
week 4　　Euler’s method and Heun’s method
week 6　　Predictor-Corrector methods
week 7　　Runge-Kutta methods (1)
week 8　　Runge-Kutta methods (2)
week 9　　Midterm examination
week 10　　Multi-steps method (Adams method)
week 11　　Simulink application for initial value problem and nonlinear systems
week 12　　K-means clustering
week 13　　Fuzzy c-means clustering
week 14　　Identification and modeling
week 15　　LMIs 
week 16　　Symbolic operations
week 17　　Project Presentation
week 18　　Final examination
materials:
1. Engineering and Scientific Computations Using MATLAB John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
    MATLAB7程式設計 作者：洪維恩 出版：旗標
2. Lecture notes and selected papers
